name: Miracle World: Fushigi no Kuni no IQ Meiro
overview: Miracle World: Fushigi no Kuni no IQ Meiro is a game in which the player take part of a TV quiz game called Miracle World Brain Power, in which he will have to answer different questions and in some trials he will have to find 5 errors in the screens before the time limit ends. The game takes the player brain to the limit and is a very challenging game since the faster player wins. The game features more than 1500 questions and also a 2 player vs mode.
